title: Random disconnects and ping spikes with stable connection?
body: For the past couple weeks, but especially since the midseason patch, I have been randomly disconnecting every couple games. This is accompanied by huge packet losses where the game will freeze for several seconds, then resumeand all animations will occur at once. Running a speedtest in the background shows i have 50 mbps download speeds, and i average 200 framerate. I have the game installing on a SSD and have absolutely no idea what is causing these issues. Anyone have suggestions?

replies.body: You mentioned that you're encountering a lot of packet loss, which would be the cause of all those stutters and disconnects. If you haven't yet, use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to test your latest game logs for any packet loss just to be 100% sure.
